participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Energetic and creative, with a passion for physical fitness and music.
participant_1.background: I love to go for long runs in the park, even when the weather is unpredictable. I take care of my appearance. As a banker, I start my day by eating a delicious steak breakfast before heading into the office. I love watching basketball. I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.

participant_2.name: Luca
participant_2.personality: Curious and sociable, with a love for culture and sports.
participant_2.background: I enjoy reading books from different cultures, including books from my parents' homeland of Italy. I started playing recreational baseball more often and even took lessons to improve my skills. I'm a huge fan of Jason Mraz. Conor McGregor is my favorite fighter. I am proud of my passion for swimming and how it has helped me to stay healthy and active.

content.text: Hey, not much! Just trying to stay active. You?
Same here, I love going for long runs in the park.
That's awesome! I just started playing recreational baseball more often.
Oh nice! I used to play baseball in high school.
I'm not very good but I'm having a lot of fun.
Good for you! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I love making music and expressing myself through it.
Oh that's cool! I love listening to music.
Do you have a favorite artist?
I'm a huge fan of Jason Mraz. What about you?
I love Jason Mraz! He's one of my favorites too.
Awesome! We should listen to his music together sometime.
